item.title: The Princess and the Dragon
item.description:
This is a snippet in my series of the game, “Slay the Princess.” It is an incredible game and made me question a lot of who I am and most importantly, why am I like this? I plan to add more to this series, but who knows when…

Preamble? Postamble?

I went into this run thinking I was being clever. I was angry at the constraints, angry at the Voices telling me what to do. I wanted to prove that I was the one pulling the strings. I wanted to break the prophecy by running straight through it.
